abstract: In a matchup of aces and rosters full of all-stars, Cardinals pinch-hitter Allen Craig was the difference as St. Louis beat the Texas Rangers in the first game of the World Series.
snippet: In a matchup of aces and rosters full of all-stars, Cardinals pinch-hitter Allen Craig was the difference as St. Louis beat the Texas Rangers in the first game of the World Series.

headline.main: Cardinals Take Game 1 of World Series
